text: The 2016–17 1. FC Nürnberg season is the 117th season in the club's football history. ==Review and events== In 2016–17 the club plays in the 2. Bundesliga. The club also took part in the 2016–17 edition of the DFB-Pokal, the German Cup. ==Friendly matches== ==Competitions== ===2.
